ComicInfo.Penciller: Alan Burrows,Bobby Rubio,Dale Eaglesham,Doug Mahnke,James Dean Smith,Alan J. Burrows,Alan J. Burrows,Dale Eaglesham,James Dean Smith,Bobby Rubio
ComicInfo.Summary: John Arcudi and Dale Eaglesham's "The Creep" sticks his ugly mug into another case, and Bobby Rubio illustrates a special feature by the group of aspiring writers who attended Steven Grant's writing workshop at last year's San Diego Comic Con. Plus: chapter one of the three-part prequel to the upcoming horror film, Dr. Giggles, by writer/director Manny Coto and artist Alan Burrows!
ComicInfo.Tags: Wacky Squirrel,Doctor Giggles,Boris the Bear,Oxel Karnhus
ComicInfo.Title: Scraps
